Here are the details for Keystone Oaks' Free Lunch Program. The program will begin on Tuesday, March 17 and will operate on weekdays through Friday, March 27.

A free bagged lunch will be available at 7 sites. Any child 18 years of age or younger is eligible; you do not need to be eligible for the Free & Reduced Lunch program in order to participate.

We ask that you not congregate at the site and that children simply "Grab & Go."

Thank you to our Food Service Department staff and to all of our community partners for making this program possible during this challenging time. #KOProud

Saturday Academy

YSWPCS is super excited to host approximately 50 scholars for Saturday Academy! These scholars, who want to expand their knowledge about Math and ELA, spend about 3 hours through this program each week. Not only are they learning here in the school building, but also have the opportunities to go on field trips in the community! Thank you to our teachers who are going above and beyond by providing this enrichment program to our scholars!

Today we started with a breakfast with middle school students in the morning.
